title: Layout Customization and Stability Improvements (Version 2.3)
description: Holiday release focused entirely on fixing bugs and improving stability. Includes layout customization with four default layouts (agent, editor, zen, browser) that can be switched using Command+Option+Tab.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor 2.3 is starting to roll out! We've spent the past two weeks fixing bugs. This release isn't about new features, it's about directly pulling up stability by 15% - fixing 15 agent bugs, 11 layout bugs, and more.
Cursor just reverted two weeks worth of development during latest update

title: Gemini 3 Flash Available
description: Gemini 3 Flash is now available for all users, combining Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed and efficiency. Achieves 78% on SWE-bench Verified benchmark.

community_feedback.quote: Impressed by the intelligence and speed - it even fixed an issue that GPT-5.1-codex couldn't. Highly efficient without sacrificing intelligence.
Achieved 78% on SWE-bench, notably outperforming Gemini 3 Pro's 72.8%. Pushes the Pareto Frontier of performance and efficiency.
Extremely unhappy with Gemini 3 responses in Windsurf

title: Nightly Build December 27, 2025
description: Version 0.24.0-nightly.20251227 released with legacy confirmation deprecations and refactoring changes. Gemini 3 Flash also announced as available in CLI on December 17.

community_feedback.quote: Gemini 3 Flash is now in Gemini CLI! Combines rapid response times with advanced AI reasoning for agentic coding workflows.
